column14: Metadata of the conglomerate artefact (description of the item)

column3:
Digital identifier of the conglomerate artefact.

column14:
Identifier of the conglomerate artefact.

column53: The artefact has remained in situ

column58: date of events (YYYY or MM-YYYY or DD-MM-YYYY or YYYY-YYYY)
